description: Build xác nhận kế toán Payoo
body:
INSERT INTO dbo.CashCollectionReceiptsNoVAT
    (
         ReceiptCode
       , ReceiptDate
       , WarehouseCode
       , VendorCode
       , RefCode
       , CustomerCode
       , CustomerName
       , MobilePhoneNumber
       , Amount
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATType
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATStatus
       , Remark
       , CreatedDateTime
       , CreatedEmployeeBy
       , IsConfirmed
       , ConfirmedDate
       , ConfirmedEmployeeBy
       , CardPaymentFee
    )
SELECT 
	'PT' + P.BillCode
	, P.BillDate
	, P.WarehouseCode
	, P.VendorCode
	, P.BillCode
	, P.CustomerPayoo
	, P.CustomerName
	, P.PayersMobiphone
	, P.TotalAmount
	, 343
	, 298
	, N'Hệ thống tạo'
	, P.CreatedDateTime
	, P.CreatedBy
	, 1
	, P.BillDate
	, 'SYSTEM'
	, 0
FROM 
	dbo.PaymentBillReceipts P (NOLOCK) 
WHERE 
	P.BillCode IN (
$CURSOR$
)
